category.name: index
category.entry: Stars Under Attack (S-U-A) is a browser game written in <abbr title="Hypertext Preprocessor">PHP 5</abbr>. The main goal of this project is to be more user friendly than other games of this kind by following the <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> <abbr title="Web Accessibility Initiative">WAI</abbr> guidelines. It uses valid <abbr title="Extensible Markup Language">XHTML</abbr> 1.0 and tries to be flexibly changable using <abbr title="Cascading Stylesheets">CSS</abbr>. Users have got many settings to use the game according to their preferences and available software.
